pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correcting Misclassified Mediation Analysis // Use three methods to estimate parameters from a mediation analysis with a binary misclassified mediator. These methods correct for the problem of "label switching" using Youden's J criteria. A detailed description of the analysis methods is available in Webb and Wells (2024), "Effect estimation in the presence of a misclassified binary mediator" doi:10.48550/arXiv.2407.06970.
